title: What are the types of computer science education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer science at the Art and Science College or Engineering College, learning inside of the “box” (computer).Computer Information Systems/Management Information Systems at a business college, learning applications “outside” of the box.Digital art at a college of artComputer engineeringOther

Computer science id divided into the following fields => Computer science => Computer security => Software engineering => Computer engineering So all types of education in computer science will focus into those above fields or categories.
